医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
核脂滴可能在衰老和疾病中发挥关键作用一项新的研究观点发表在 Aging 杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 22 期，题为“核脂滴：核稳态和衰老的新型调节剂。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Nuclear-lipid-droplets-could-play-a-key-role-in-aging-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Nuclear-lipid-droplets-could-play-a-key-role-in-aging-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=288c8643-f003-497d-a810-e2c0630bb76f Tue, 07 Jan 2025 12:37:40 -0500 Nuclear lipid droplets could play a key role in aging and disease
纽约大学朗格尼分校收购罗斯曼骨科公司扩大业务范围纽约大学朗格健康中心和纽约大学朗格骨科今天宣布收购大纽约州的罗斯曼骨科，进一步扩大该系统在这些新诊所的顶级产品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/NYU-Langone-expands-footprint-with-Rothman-Orthopaedics-acquisition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/NYU-Langone-expands-footprint-with-Rothman-Orthopaedics-acquisition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb1dc50-bf2a-433e-9ce7-c0cce7264a4c Tue, 07 Jan 2025 12:30:12 -0500 NYU Langone expands footprint with Rothman Orthopaedics acquisition
高丽大学和耶鲁大学主办医疗保健人工智能创新论坛10月2日（周三），高丽大学医学院（院长：Pyun Sung-Bom）在医学院六楼报告厅举办了题为“通过临床信息学和自然语言处理中的数据和人工智能创新推进医疗保健”的论坛。第一医疗大楼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Korea-University-and-Yale-host-forum-on-AI-innovations-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Korea-University-and-Yale-host-forum-on-AI-innovations-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f61fc952-9d15-4689-a0bd-6fb90883a1c3 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 12:27:49 -0500 Korea University and Yale host forum on AI innovations in healthcare
年轻人患侵袭性胃癌的风险不断增加从历史上看，胃癌是一种主要影响老年人的疾病。然而，新兴研究表明一个巨大的变化：年轻人现在面临的风险越来越大，这一人群中的病例变得更加激进。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Younger-adults-face-increasing-risk-of-aggressive-gastric-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Younger-adults-face-increasing-risk-of-aggressive-gastric-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96355fe7-b4b0-4948-8163-a06beb75b29c Tue, 07 Jan 2025 11:25:16 -0500 Younger adults face increasing risk of aggressive gastric cancer
研究揭示中性粒细胞在癌症进展中的动态作用中性粒细胞是人体内最丰富的白细胞，主要因其在抵抗感染和调节炎症方面的重要作用而被认可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Study-reveals-neutropils-dynamic-role-in-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Study-reveals-neutropils-dynamic-role-in-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a463716-8071-4c67-8771-0b5c9ce9f1b0 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 11:18:48 -0500 Study reveals neutrophils' dynamic role in cancer progression
普利茅斯大学与 IOE 合作提供全球整骨疗法培训普利茅斯大学和国际整骨教育 (IOE) 建立了新的合作伙伴关系，将为来自世界各地有抱负的整骨医生提供一流的培训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/University-of-Plymouth-partners-with-IOE-to-offer-global-osteopathy-training.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/University-of-Plymouth-partners-with-IOE-to-offer-global-osteopathy-training.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bb32bde-925d-4d5a-874c-4fac14e4cad1 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 11:14:24 -0500 University of Plymouth partners with IOE to offer global osteopathy training
15 岁之前吸烟与慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 风险较高相关一项新研究表明，15 岁之前儿童时期吸烟会增加患慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Smoking-before-age-15-linked-to-higher-COPD-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Smoking-before-age-15-linked-to-higher-COPD-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=deabd3cb-16f9-4165-b3d5-6b6dbd69352b Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:35:39 -0500 Smoking before age 15 linked to higher COPD risk
Myriad Genetics 和 MD 安德森合作评估分子残留疾病检测德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和 Myriad Genetics, Inc. 今天宣布建立为期五年的战略联盟，以加速 Myriad 分子残留病 (MRD) 检测的临床评估和开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Myriad-Genetics-and-MD-Anderson-partner-to-evaluate-molecular-residual-disease-assay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Myriad-Genetics-and-MD-Anderson-partner-to-evaluate-molecular-residual-disease-assay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88d9aa35-b6ff-45e3-8d26-ad406a382a2c Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:20:08 -0500 Myriad Genetics and MD Anderson partner to evaluate molecular residual disease assay
吸烟会增加慢性肾脏病的风险吗？研究人员确定吸烟是否会增加患慢性肾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Does-smoking-increase-chronic-kidney-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Does-smoking-increase-chronic-kidney-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0c52c0c-9453-4616-a059-34c6ca6e1d08 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:19:00 -0500 Does smoking increase chronic kidney disease risk?
十分之一的新糖尿病病例与含糖饮料有关含糖饮料的消费正在导致全球数以百万计的糖尿病和心脏病病例，并造成严重的区域健康不平等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Sugar-sweetened-drinks-linked-to-1-in-10-new-diabetes-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Sugar-sweetened-drinks-linked-to-1-in-10-new-diabetes-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52fae8e2-e847-4d45-bf93-13ccc95a2437 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:15:00 -0500 Sugar-sweetened drinks linked to 1 in 10 new diabetes cases
